title: Low: there are limits to the effectiveness of monetary policy
itunes:title: Low: there are limits to the effectiveness of monetary policy
description:
FTN Financial's Chris Low weighs in on cutting rates and the limits of monetary policy on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.
